name: fdnix-search-lambda
description: Rust AWS Lambda for fdnix hybrid search with LanceDB (custom runtime)

scripts.build: cargo build --release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-musl && mkdir -p dist && cp target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/release/bootstrap dist/
scripts.build-dev: cargo build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-musl && mkdir -p dist && cp target/x86_64-unknown-linux-musl/release/bootstrap dist/
